name: The Oath (itch)
description:
The in-progress demo for a post-apocalyptic game.

Play as Siobahn, a young medic travelling through Boston, attempting to balance taking care of the many patients assigned to you, the patients you come across in your travels, random encounters, and a variety of others. You have 8 weeks to go before you're able to meet your family, what will you prioritize?

Currently in progress of development:

  • Needing Character Art
  • Original Music
  • Finishing Chapter 1
  • Finishing Outlining Other Chapters
